title: Unna Nenachche Lyrics Apoorva Sagodharargal
stanzas:
Unna nenachche paattu padichchen
thangame nyaana thangame
enna nenachche naanum sirichen
thangame nyaana thangame (2)

andha vaanam azhuthaa thaan
indha boomiye sirikkum
vaanam pol silapaer
sondha vazhkaiyum irukkum.
unarndhen naan...

Unna nenachche paattu padichchen
thangame nyaana thangame
enna nenachche naanum sirichen
thangame nyaana thangame (2)

aasai vandhu ennai
aatti vaiththa paavam.
mattravarai naan yaen
kuttram solla venum.

kottum mazhai kaalam
uppu virka ponen.
kattradikkum neram
maavu virka ponen.

Unna nenachche paattu padichchen
thangame nyaana thangame
enna nenachche naanum sirichen
thangame nyaana thangame (2)

kannil rendil naanthaan
kadhal enum kottai
katti vaiththu paarthen
aththanaiyum oattai

Unna nenachche paattu padichchen
thangame nyaana thangame
enna nenachche naanum sirichen
thangame nyaana thangame
